Dear Dick*
•, v ,
You 'Ai.ll recall that Si asked me to prepare a brochure
on-NA3B—what it is, what it offers, its members, the ad-
vantages of membership in it, etc* I remember your very
kind offer to provide me with some ideas on such a brochure

My best always*
Sincerely yours.
Graydon Ausmus, Director
